Module hu.unipannon.virt.plot
Package hu.unipannon.virt.plot.control

Class FrameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.unipannon.virt.plot.control.FrameController
  • public class FrameController
extends java.lang.Object
    The Frame Controller handles all the frame settings that are the same for every plot type: axes, legend etc. For the plot to show properly, the plot space needs to be filled in. This operation can be implemented with a Plot Space Controller.
    Author:
    Tóth Bálint
    See Also:
    PlotSpaceController

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  FrameController.TickDir
      Represents tick directon related to the axis line.
      static class  FrameController.XLocation
      Represents possible locations of the horizontal axis.
      static class  FrameController.YLocation
      Represents possible locations of the vertical axis.

      • FrameController

        public FrameController()
        Default constructs a Frame Controller. Every value is null, or contains default settings.

      • addPlotSpaceController

        public void addPlotSpaceController​(PlotSpaceController psc)
        Sets a plot space controller.
        Parameters:
        psc - some implementation of the plot space controller.

      • box

        public void box​(boolean box)
        Sets the border of the plot space.
        Parameters:
        box - true enables all the axis items around the plot space.

      • display

        public javafx.scene.layout.Pane display()
        Creates a JavaFX Pane object that contains the previously configured Frame. Requires a PlotSpaceController to be set.
        Returns:
        pane containg the frame.

      • getFrame

        public Frame getFrame()
        Query for the frame graphical object. Can be used for fine modifications directly on the Frame.
        Returns:
        reference to the Frame.
